quote: It was one of the best PDs I've participated in. My mind literally exploded as I UNDERSTOOD math and some very basic concepts with an inquiry mindset!!!
author: William Bayliss

quote: Just wanted to thank you for all the ideas.  I've been starting my resource room Algebra class with one of your puzzles and the kids love it!  I was afraid it would take away from class time, but they actually work faster on their regular assignments on days we start with a mind warm-up. They're also more willing to tackle new concepts without panicking.
author: Roxanna Rubinic

quote: I wanted to thank you again for coming out to Albuquerque and speaking at the Inspiring Mathematical Minds conference. You did a phenomenal job! The entire Albuquerque Public School math department board as well as the district leaders were beyond impressed!
author: Aaron Springer

quote: I really can't convey just how much I love your session.  There are some people who are amazing at presenting information in a way that keeps people engaged and you are definitely one of them!  Which I guess I should have figured given your session topic!
author: Christina Tondevold

quote: My kids are excited to come to math class now and I can't believe how much they are capable of!
author: Intervention Specialist

quote: Dr. Shah's full day workshop was awesome! Two days later, we are still talking Math!!! It was a wonderful PD. Thank you for your time, insight AND activities.
author: Karen Mahan
